title: 3(a) and 3(b) of section 37B of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007, as
heading: In this Order—
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order— 

‘Act of 2007’ means the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (No. 7 of 
2007); 

“Chief Executive Officer of Pobal” is the accountable person in relation to the 
accounts of Pobal; 

“Community Climate Action Supports” mean such moneys as within the 
Climate Action Fund, and contained within an account of that Fund as 
determined by the Minister, to be made available, subject to the Act of 2007, to 
support community climate action through education, capacity building and 
learning; 

“Climate Action Fund”, is the fund as established with effect from 1 August 
2020, under Section 37B(1) of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007, as 
inserted into the 2007 Act by Section 15 of the National Oil Reserves Agency 
(Amendment) and Provision of Central Treasury Services Act 2020; 

“Minister” means Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications; 

“Pobal” is a not-for-profit company, limited by guarantee under the aegis of the 
Minister for Rural and Community Development.

title: 3(a) and 3(b) of section 37B of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007, as
heading: 3. (1) Subject to any directions or guidelines as may from time to time be
text_raw:
3. (1) Subject to any directions or guidelines as may from time to time be 
given by the Minister under section 37B(3)(c) of the Act of 2007 to Pobal, the 
management of the Community Climate Action Supports within the Climate 
Action Fund is delegated to Pobal, which shall have all the powers that are 
necessary or incidental to the performance of its function in managing the 
Community Climate Action Supports. 

(2) Pobal may, subject to section 37B(11) of the Act of 2007, pay out of the 
Community Climate Action Supports such amounts of moneys the Minister 
considers appropriate in accordance with section 37B (9) of the Act of 2007. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 16th September, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [449] 3 

(3) Any moneys approved by the Minister for payment by Pobal that are 
unused or returned to Pobal in relation to any project or projects shall be 
returned to the Community Climate Action Supports account.

title: 3(a) and 3(b) of section 37B of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007, as
heading: 4. (1) The Chief Executive Officer of Pobal shall be responsible to the
text_raw:
4. (1) The Chief Executive Officer of Pobal shall be responsible to the 
Minister for all proper and usual accounts in relation to the performance of the 
functions delegated or granted to Pobal under this Order. 

(2) The Chief Executive Officer of Pobal shall keep, in such form as may 
be approved by the Minister, all proper and usual accounts in relation to the 
performance of the functions delegated or granted to Pobal under this Order. 

(3) The Chief Executive Officer of Pobal shall provide to the Minister such 
accounts and information in relation to such accounts as the Minister may from 
time to time specify. 

(4) The Chief Executive Officer of Pobal shall include in the annual 
financial statements and accounts of Pobal all moneys in relation to this Order 
and shall submit these statements in the usual way for audit. A copy of the 
accounts as so audited, together with a copy of the report by the Comptroller 
and Auditor General on those accounts, shall be presented to the Minister as 
soon as may be thereafter.

title: 3(a) and 3(b) of section 37B of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007, as
heading: 5. (1) As soon as may be, but not later than 6 months after the end of each
text_raw:
5. (1) As soon as may be, but not later than 6 months after the end of each 
financial year of Pobal, the Chief Executive Officer of Pobal shall make a 
report to the Minister of its activities in relation to the performance during the 
year concerned of the functions delegated to Pobal under this Order. 

(2) The Chief Executive Officer of Pobal shall supply the Minister with 
such information as the Minister may from time-to-time request relating to the 
performance by Pobal of the functions delegated to them under this Order. 

(3) The Chief Executive Officer of Pobal shall, when requested by the 
Minister, make recommendations to the Minister in relation to the functions 
performed by Pobal under this Order. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 September, 2022. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications.

EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of this Order is to delegate to Pobal certain functions related to the 
management of the Community Climate Action Supports within the Climate 
Action Fund.
